panels.title: Notes

options.content:
Data on this Dashboard should be final data and will only appear in 1 to 2 days in a rears. Data for these panel come from the following OPEN APIs
- enhancedtraffic-by-country - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/enhancedtraffic-by-country.html
- bytes-by-time - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/bytes-by-time.html
- hits-by-time - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/hits-by-time.html
- bytes-by-cpode - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/bytes-by-cpcode.html
- hits-by-cpcode - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/hits-by-cpcode.html

panels.title: Peak Data by All CPCode

targets.query: SELECT max("edgeBytes") FROM "enhancedtraffic-by-country" WHERE ("cpcode" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "country"

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "bytes-by-cpcode" WITH KEY = "accountid"
list.label: AccountId
list.name: accountid
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "bytes-by-cpcode" WITH KEY = "accountid"

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "todaytraffic-by-time" WITH KEY = "cpcode"
list.name: cpcodes_available
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "todaytraffic-by-time" WITH KEY = "cpcode"

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcodeNameNum" WHERE "cpcode" =~ /$cpcodes_available/
list.label: CPCode Selection
list.name: cpcodes_selection
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcodeNameNum" WHERE "cpcode" =~ /$cpcodes_available/

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcode" WHERE "cpcodeNameNum" =~ /$cpcodes_selection/
list.name: cpcode
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcode" WHERE "cpcodeNameNum" =~ /$cpcodes_selection/
